snippet: Chris Tillman outpitched Justin Verlander, allowing one run while working into the ninth, and the visiting Orioles avoided being swept by handing the Tigers their first loss.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Baltimore Orioles defeat Detroit Tigers, 3-1; other baseball news and scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Tillman outpitched Justin Verlander, allowing one run while working into the ninth, and the visiting Orioles avoided being swept by handing the Tigers their first loss.

headline.main: Detroit’s Streak Ends With Loss to Baltimore
headline.print_headline: Detroit’s Streak Ends With Loss to Baltimore
